desc.p: This Java class stores an index into a BufferCombo.
This class is used for the sake of speed. For a real index, see TextIndex.

var.name: updateNumber
var.desc: The integer read from the related DataSource. If this integer doesnt match the DataSource's versionNumber, then the BufferIndex must be recalculated.

var.name: index
var.desc: An index from the start of the buffer.

var.name: zoomValid
var.desc: Tells if the zoom variables are valid.

var.name: zoomComboIndex
var.desc: Index into the BufferCombo, specifying a BufferElement.

var.name: zoomElementIndex
var.desc: Index into the BufferElement, a position in data.
